oshiSkill.name: マスコット創造  ("Mascot Creation")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Reveal 1 mascot from your deck, and add it to hand. Then, shuffle the deck.

spOshiSkill.name: フブキングダム  ("Fubukingdom")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] You may roll a die once for every 2 mascots on your stage if your white holomem downed your opponent's holomem:If an odd number appears once or more, your opponent gets life-1.

oshiSkill.name: HALU
oshiSkill.description: (Once per turn) By archiving 1 green cheer from your holomem, reveal 1 cheer from your cheer deck, and send it to your holomem. Then, shuffle the cheer deck.

spOshiSkill.name: 極彩色の宴 ("A Colorful Feast")
spOshiSkill.description: (Once per game) During this turn, all of your holomem on stage with #IDGen2 get Arts+20 for each of that holomem's cheer colors.

oshiSkill.name: Ahoy
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Bloom 1 of your holomem with #Gen3 that bloomed this turn once more using a holomem from your hand.

spOshiSkill.name: 出航~!  ("Shukkou~!")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Deal 50 special damage for each holomem stacked to your 〈Houshou Marine〉 center holomem to your opponent's center holomem or collab holomem.

oshiSkill.name: ぽえぽえぽえ～  ("poepoepoe~")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Usable if your center holomem is 〈Sakamata Chloe〉:Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Archive all of those cards, or return them to the top of the deck in any order.

spOshiSkill.name: 人生リセットボタン  ("Life Reset Button")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Count the number of cards in your hand, return [all of your hand cards and all of your archived holomem] to deck and shuffle it. Then, draw 1 card for each card returned from hand to deck.

oshiSkill.name: ねえ”え”え”え”え”え”("Neeeeeee")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Usable when your 〈Murasaki Shion〉's ability rolled a die:Reroll the die once.

spOshiSkill.name: シオンのすごい魔法  ("Shion's Amazing Magic")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Usable when your purple center holomem used Arts:Deal 50 special damage to your opponent's center holomem for each of your opponent's center holomem's cheers.

oshiSkill.name: ゾンビ戦術 ("Zombie Tactics")
oshiSkill.description: (Once per turn) Bloom 1 of your holomem with #IDGen2 using a holomem from your archive.

spOshiSkill.name: 蘇るオリー ("Ollie resurrection")
spOshiSkill.description: (Once per game) Draw 4 cards, and archive 2 cards from hand. You may bloom 1 of your holomem using a holomem from your archive.

oshiSkill.name: サンプリング ("Sampling")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] By archiving 2 cards from your hand, return 2 holomem with #EN from archive to hand.

spOshiSkill.name: 死神ラップ  ("Shinigami Rap")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Usable if your center holomem is 〈Mori Calliope〉:During this turn, after 1 of your 〈Mori Calliope〉 used Arts, use the same Arts once more.
